thread.title: 20 Guys Ask The Super Inappropriate Questions They Really Want Girls To Answer

author: Dr. Dakota Fox
title: 20 Guys Ask The Super Inappropriate Questions They Really Want Girls To Answer
text:
@carleyscamera 1. “What is the strangest thing you’ve inserted into your vagina or ass?”
— PM_ME_Y0UR_BUTTH0LE 
2. “Do you ever see a guy and just want to fuck his brains out?”
— DangoDemolisher 
3. “Do you ever have conversations about periods with other girls?”
— theseconddennis 
4. “How much do you fear being raped on a day to day basis? I know this is a weird question, but I keep hearing about how high rape rates are, so I’m trying to gauge public opinion.”
— ValorousVagabond 
5. “Does size really matter? I am definitely asking this for a friend.”
— fifa17player 
6. “If I accidentally (or just purposefully take a quick peek) at your chest or butt and you catch me, are you judging me negatively or taking it as flattery?”
— slicebishybosh 
7. “How long does it take for you to cum? Do you care if you cum?”
— jimmyshmittens 
8. “If you excrete enough vaginal fluids and let it dry up, will your vagina lips crust shut themselves to the point you have to have it operated on to open?”
— Sragas 
9. “What percentage of guys that you see randomly are you attracted to?”
— Bloodysneeze 
10. “Does it bother you to never/rarely orgasm? Or is sex still great even if you don’t? If men didn’t finish easily I feel like they’d be much less eager.”
— caramelcooler 
11. “How many times do you go out on dates just for the free stuff? how often do you pay for dates? how many guys have you had sex with? how often do you lie about these questions to not seem like a bad person?”

12. “When you say, ‘Not tonight’, how often is it because parts of you need grooming?”
— -917- 
13. “Do girls even get aroused from looking at a dick pic?”
— PM_ME_YOUR_DATABASES 
14. “Do you ever realize that your yoga pants are see-thru in sunlight?”
— Ironm80 
15. “What are some things that turns you on?”
— DarambeStorm 
16. “Does it make you uncomfortable when guys check you out while wearing leggings, etc (whether anyone can see through them or not)?”
— Ironm80 
17. “How many cocks have you sucked and how much cum have you swallowed? How many guys have fucked that ass?”
— Doubleagain00 
18. “Do you ever make jokes like ‘I fucked your dad, etc’ as an equivalent to guys saying they fucked the other dude’s mom?”
— Ironm80 
19. “Do you ever just walk over to that guy and try to pick up him up?”
— DangoDemolisher 
20. “How big is too big?”
— DangoDemolisher
